synopsis.text: Enter a realm where dreams are not just figments of imagination, but the lifeblood of its inhabitants. In this dream world, a young woman, once ordinary, finds herself thrust into an extraordinary destiny as a long-lost princess. But her newfound royal status comes with a daunting responsibility: the dream world is under siege by malevolent entities known as 'yumekui' or 'dream-eaters'. These nefarious creatures prey on the dreams of the world's princes, leaving them trapped in an eternal slumber. With the fate of the dream world hanging in the balance, the new princess must rally the princes, awakening them from their dreamless sleep and uniting them against the relentless onslaught of the dream-eaters. This thrilling anime weaves a tale of courage, destiny, and the power of dreams, inviting viewers to embark on an unforgettable journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
